constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum loan amount only applies at time of application

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian citizen or permanent residency only

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: First application includes the cost of the first standard valuation and legal fees of one security only (and includes 2 splits)

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes loan split requests, additional splits, loan top up on existing loan, substitution of security, loan re-fix fee and loan switches (loan switching to a different loan type)

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application fee, inspection fees and draw-down fees throughout construction period. Legal fees are paid in addition to this and are at cost.

fees.additionalInfo: E.g. certificate of titles, wills, etc

fees.name: SPECIAL_ATTENDANCE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

listData.name: STANDARD VARIABLE HOME LOAN - OWNER-OCCUPIED (Interest Only)
listData.description: A variable loan for owner occupiers with flexible features such as a 100% offset account to help pay your loan off sooner. Includes a competitive rate, access to redraw plus a range of other features.

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum loan amount only applies at time of application

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian citizen or permanent residency only

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: First application includes the cost of the first standard valuation and legal fees of one security only (and includes 2 splits)

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes loan split requests, additional splits, loan top up on existing loan, substitution of security, loan re-fix fee and loan switches (loan switching to a different loan type)

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application fee, inspection fees and draw-down fees throughout construction period. Legal fees are paid in addition to this and are at cost.

fees.name: SAFE_CUSTODY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: E.g. certificate of titles, wills, etc

fees.name: SPECIAL_ATTENDANCE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

fees.name: COPY_OF_STATEMENT_(ALREADY_ISSUED)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per page. For statements issued prior to January 1997 the fee is $3 per page.

fees.name: SOLICITORS_PREPARATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

fees.name: SEARCH_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at cost

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE_(LMI)
fees.additionalInfo: The amount of this fee will be available on application, as it is dependent on the loan to valuation ratio of each loan.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The comparison rate is based on a secured loan amount of $150,000 over a loan term of 25 years.
